fvs.taxe.controller.Context

  • Packages that use Context 
    Package Description
    fvs.taxe.controller

    • Uses of Context in fvs.taxe.controller

      Constructors in fvs.taxe.controller with parameters of type Context 
      Constructor and Description
      GoalController(Context context)
      The instantation method sets up listeners for Goal changes and Player changes so that it can update the UI accordingly,
      ObstacleController(Context context)
      The Instantiation method sets up the particle effects and creates a listener for when an Obstacle is started so that it can update the graphics accordingly.
      ResourceController(Context context)
      The instantiation method sets up a listener that updates the player Resources graphics when the player changes.
      RouteController(Context context)
      Instantiation method.
      ScoreController(Context context)
      Instantiation method.
      StationController(Context context, Tooltip tooltip)
      Instatiation method.
      TopBarController(Context context)
      Instantiation method sets up a listener for Events starting to display the Event message in the Top Bar.
      TrainController(Context context)
      Instantiation method.
      TrainMoveController(Context context, Train train)
      Instantiation adds a turn listener to interrupt the train's action when a turn changes.
